p: Table 4 shows the effects of dietary RC supplementation on hen performance from weeks 1 to 12. All hens remained healthy and no mortality occurred throughout the study period. There was no significant difference in feed intake, laying rate, or egg weight between the control group and those that received RC; however, the FCR of the hens in the 0.5% RC treatment group was significantly ( P=0.013) lower than the control.
